entries.name: new(args = [], local_options = {}, config = {})
entries.desc: It receives arguments in an Array and two hashes, one for options and other for configuration.

entries.name: shell()
entries.desc: Returns the shell used in all Bundler::Thor classes. If you are in a Unix platform it will use a colored log, otherwise it will use a basic one without color.

entries.name: subclass_files()
entries.desc: Returns the files where the subclasses are kept.

entries.name: subclasses()
entries.desc: Returns the classes that inherits from Bundler::Thor or Bundler::Thor::Group.
